Title: M-2 HIT DAMAGE AGAINST GERMAN FIGHTER
Description: Roll one die for each hit result from Table M-1.

1.description: Fighter damaged but continues attack at -1

2.description: Fighter damaged but continues attack at -1

3.description: Fighter damaged and breaks off after this attack -2

4.description: Fighter damaged and breaks off after this attack -2

5.description: Fighter destroyed and may not fire at B-17

6.description: Fighter destroyed and may not fire at B-17

notes: a) Twin guns (Ball and Top Turrets and Tail Guns) add +1 to die roll, except against FW 190.
b) All damage die rolls against FW 190 are -1, unless firing gun was a twin gun which roll damage normally.
